title: 3 Easy Ways to Log in to Spotify

steps.title: Open Spotify.
steps.content: Open Spotify. This app icon looks like a green circle with black sound waves inside it that you'll find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Log In or Continue with Facebook.
steps.content: Tap Log In or Continue with Facebook . You'll see these options below the green button that links to signing up for the service. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your email and password (if you tapped "Log In" in the previous step).
steps.content: Enter your email and password (if you tapped "Log In" in the previous step). If you previously chose to "Continue with Facebook," you will be automatically logged in if you have a Facebook account linked with your Spotify account. If not, you'll be prompted to link them. Tap Log In to continue. Once you successfully logged in, you will see suggested music and playlists as well as your recently played. If you need to log out, tap the settings icon (it looks like a gear) and tap Log out at the bottom of the menu. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Go to https://accounts.spotify.com/en/login?continue=https in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://accounts.spotify.com/en/login?continue=https in a web browser. You can use any web browser like Safari or Chrome to log in.

steps.title: Choose a login method.
steps.content: Choose a login method. Enter your email and password or click Continue with Facebook or Continue with Apple . If you chose to enter your email address and password, click Log In to continue. [4] X Research source If your Facebook or Apple account aren't connected with a Spotify account, you'll be prompted to enter your Spotify password to link them.

steps.title: Choose if you want to visit your account page or launch the web player.
steps.content: Choose if you want to visit your account page or launch the web player. You can either go to your account settings or listen to music in your browser after you log in. If you want to log out, click your profile name in the upper right corner of the page and click Log out . [5] X Research source

steps.title: Open Spotify.
steps.content: Open Spotify. This app icon looks like a green circle with black sound waves inside it that you'll find in your Start menu or Applications folder. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click Log In.
steps.content: Click Log In . It's in the middle of the app window.

steps.title: Choose a login method.
steps.content: Choose a login method. You can either enter your email and password or click Log In With Facebook . If you enter your email and password, click Log In to continue. If your Facebook account is not connected with a Spotify account, you'll be prompted to enter your Spotify password to link them. Once you've logged in, you'll see your playlists, radio stations, and recently listened to music. To log out, click your name and profile picture (it's usually centered at the top of the application window) and click Log Out . [7] X Research source
